title: Auto-SPT: Automating Semantic Preserving Transformations for Code
summary: Machine learning (ML) models for code clone detection determine whether two pieces of code are semantically equivalent, which in turn is a key building block for software-engineering tasks like refactoring and security tasks like vulnerability and malware detection.
